column1: pasqualina ""lena"" m. briggs| pasqualina m. lena di. donato cirillo briggs
column10: nj. born in new york city
column12: she resided in the trenton area most of her life and for the past twenty-two years in toms river
column13: nj. mrs. briggs was employed as an assembly line technician for more than twenty years at general motors corporation
column14: ewing township until her retirement in 1985
column15: and was formerly employed by abes sewing shop
column17: nj. lena was a member of the red hats
column18: gilford yacht club and toms river senior citizen club. daughter of the late luigi and gracia caldarola di. donato; beloved wife of the late pasquale cirillo and william w. briggs; sister of the late frank
column22: and julia di. donato and anna pippen; and mother-in-law of the late louis f. tallone; she is survived by her two daughters and sons-in-law
column23: adeline t. adele and john r. gallagher and grace cirillo matthews and her husband russ matthews; a brother and sister-in-law
column24: jimmy and grace di. donato; two sisters
column25: mary johnson and emily parriski; a sister-in-law
column28: louis f. jr. and kristi tallone
column31: amy m. smith and patricia l. smith; twenty-four great-grandchildren; brothers-in-law and sisters-in-law
column42: and friends. the funeral will be held on wednesday morning june 10
column43: 2015 at 9:30 a. m. from the brenna funeral home
column46: nj. a mass of christian burial will be celebrated on wednesday morning
column47: at 11 a. m. at saint marys church
column50: nj. burial will follow in holy sepulchre cemetery
column51: hamilton. calling hours for family and friends will be held on tuesday evening from 6:00 p. m. to 8:00 p. m. at the brenna funeral home. in lieu of flowers
column52: memorial contributions may be made in her name to the charity of the donors choice. to send the family condolences or for directions please visit www. brennafuneralhome. com
